mdragon::Input

Input Class Reference

Provides support for input devices. More...

 Check if stylus is down.

void Clear ()
 Clears input key & pend down/pressed states.

Detailed Description

Provides support for input devices.

You don't have to create instances of this by yourself, use input member of System class instance instead.

Member Function Documentation

Bool PenState (  Short *  x,
Short *  y
) 
 

Get state of stylus.

Parameters:
x - pointer to variable to store pen x coordinate.
y - pointer to variable to store pen y coordinate.
Returns:
True if pen is down, False otherwise.
